mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, pwd, nickname, city, district, phone, email) values(#{userid}, #{pwd}, #{nickname}, #{city}, #{district}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: select userid, pwd from member where userid = #{userid}
select * from city order by citycode
select * from district order by citycode
mapper.insert: insert into GOODS(articleNum, userid, city, district, major, sub, contents, hashtag, selectionWay, postingTime) values(SEQ_GOODS.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{city}, #{district}, #{major}, #{sub}, #{contents}, #{hashtag}, #{selectionWay}, sysdate)

insert into GOODS_FILE(idx, articleNum, original_file_name, stored_file_name, file_size, postingTime) values(SEQ_GOODS_FILE.NEXTVAL, SEQ_GOODS.CURRVAL, #{original_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{file_size}, sysdate)
